resources.string: Hi, I\'m jukefox, the mobile music expert. During the next minutes I will try to catch album covers from the web and get music similarity information for your songs. It\'s highly recommended to activate an Internet connection before continuing.

For a successful import of your music, your songs need CORRECT ID3 TAGS FOR ARTIST, ALBUM AND TITLE. The import requires an active internet connection (WLAN, if possible) and may take a long time. Do you want to start it now?

Copyright DISCO @ ETH ZÃ¼rich
www.jukefox.org

based on last.fm data and MusicExplorer
www.musicexplorer.org
www.last.fm

Icons by Mathias Kober

Contact:
musicexplorer@tik.ee.ethz.ch

on the device. Did you mean:

You want to update incrementally (just look for new files; takes less time) or update everything (detects changes in tags or album covers)?
Could not connect to Audioscrobbler. Either username and password are wrong, or you don\'t have an active Internet connection.
OK, I am aware of it
jukefox connects to the Internet after listening to
song(s). Be aware, that depending on your contract this might generate extra costs.
Do not repeat an artist for

In order to improve jukefox and to do further usability research, we would like to collect some anonymous usage data. Is this OK for you? If you answer yes we will ask again before we send it (see FAQ on jukefox.org for more information).
We collected anonymous usage data (if you used tags or used the map etc.; see FAQ on jukefox.org for more info). We would you like to send them now. Is this OK?
You can have a look at the log file on your SD-card named \'.jukefoxUsageLog.txt\'. Are we allowed to ask you later if you want to send it?
log usage data (see FAQ on jukefox.org)
Error: Could not access music file!
Play all songs of this artist
Append all songs of this artist to the playlist
Insert all songs of this artist into the playlist
Play all songs of this genre
Append all songs of this genre to the playlist
Insert all songs of this genre into the playlist
Do you really want to cancel the update?
Update cancelled. Please run the update again to use the application.
No songs could be read. Make sure your SD card with music files is inserted and was properly unmounted from the computer.
Wipe your finger on the zoom bar for faster and more precise control.
Run the update again (Settings->update) to make album loading faster
jukefox will locally store the scrobble infos. They are not sent until you deactivate this option
Please restart jukefox to apply the settings.
Always go to currently playing album
Automatically show cover art instead of playlist

jukefox offers play modes that are based on music similarity. To provide this functionality, we have set up a huge database containing information about the relationships among songs and artists. In the import step, we fetch the data relevant to your collection from our server. To do so, we send artist name and title of your songs to our server. The information exchange is done anonymously, and the data is not passed on to any third parties.
Highlight currently played album in map

In order to allow a successful import of your music, your songs should have CORRECT ID3 TAGS FOR ARTIST, ALBUM AND TITLE. The import requires an active internet connection (WLAN, if possible) and may take a long time. Do you want to start it now?

The following songs of your collection were not recognized and will therefore not be available in jukefox. This is mostly due to incorrect tagging. You can find this list in the file "UnrecognizedSongs.txt" on the SD-card.
Resume music when headphones are plugged in

Normally, gapless playback works automatically (the player tries to learn the gap). If you still hear a small gap after enabling gapless playback and listening to a few tracks, try to increase the value below. If the tracks overlap, decrease the value.

The advantages of a similarity aware player like jukefox can only be seen in conjuction with a large music collection. You have only relatively few tracks on your device and will therefore not be able to see the full potential of jukefox. For a quick overview of the possibilities, search for jukefox on youtube.
Use cover.jpg etc. in folders as album art (see help)
Help improving jukefox by sending usage data
There are no playlists available in the jukefox playlist directory.
Too many results. Some results are not shown. Enter more specific term.
jukefox is currently updating your library information, thus this list might not yet be complete.
jukefox is computing properties of your music files. The tag cloud will be fully available when this has completed.
jukefox is computing properties of your music files. The music map will be fully available when this has completed.
jukefox is currently fetching album art for your music. Therefore, not all covers are available.
jukefox will import your new music in the background. This will take some minutes.

Currently there are not enough songs with similarity information available to use smart shuffling. jukefox is fetching this information from the web in the background. For this process to be successful, it is important that your music files are well tagged (artist, title) and that your device is reliably connected to the Internet.
Get to know jukefox. Please select a topic.

This slideshow will show you the main elements of jukefox. Press next to see the next slide and previous to see the previous slide. You can always go back to the help menu or to the player by pressing the back button of your device.

jukefox is a player and browser for large music collection. Beside the normal features like alphabetical lists it offers much more elaborate functions that are based on the notion of music similarity.
The basic navigation is done using the 5 tabs at the top of the screen. They are from left to right: The player tab, the lists tab, the search tab, the 3d space tab, the 2d map tab.
The player tab offers you the main player controls, access to the play mode menu (1), or to the playlist menu (2). The current playlist can be seen by clicking on the large cover (3).
The lists tab allows you to select music from variety of lists. Long click on certain list items will show a context menu.

In the search tab you can search for artists and titles (it searches while you\'re typing). Select the "famous artist" option to search for artists that are not on your device. jukefox will suggest songs from your collection that are similar to the famous artist.
The space (1) and the map (2) tabs display a landscape of your music collection. In those views, your albums are arranged by similarity.
Use the zoom bar at the right side (swipe your finger on it) to zoom in and out. On devices with Android 2.0 or newer you can use multitouch gestures (pinch and unpinch) to zoom.
The album detail is displayed to you when you select an album. It lists the artist, the name of the album, and all tracks belonging to this album.

Each track can be selected by the green tick at the right side. By pressing the select all button (1), or the select none button (2) you can achieve the wanted selection quicker. If you press play (3) jukefox will start to play the selected songs (and clear the current playlist).

By pressing the "append to playlist" button (1), all selected tracks are appended at the end of the current playlist. By pressing the "insert as next" button (2), all selecteed songs are inserted directly after the current position in the current playlist.
To see the current playlist, just quickly press the large album cover in the player screen (1). The playlist menu can be accessed with the according button (2).
By pressing long on a song in the playlist, a context menu for this song is shown.
If you save a playlist in the playlist menu, it will also save the current position in the playlist and in the current song (for example for audio books).
You can select a play mode by pressing the play mode menu button (1) in the player tab.
The repeat all play mode restarts from the beginning of a playlist once it arrived at the end.
The play once play mode stops at the end of the playlist.
The shuffle play mode lets you select if you want to shuffle in the current playlist or shuffle over your whole collection.
The similar song play mode automatically adds songs to the end of the playlist that are similar to the last played song.
To avoid boring playlists (all by the same artist), jukefox lets you set how many subsequent songs should not be by the same artist.
The smart shuffle play mode is designed to find your current mood. It selects new songs based on which songs you skipped and which ones you listened to the end.
Press the Dpad in the map tab and use you finger to create a playlist containing a certain region.
A long click on an artist in the artist list opens the context menu.
Press the home button to unlock the screen
You are not connected to the Internet. Make sure you have a valid Internet connection to use this feature.
At this moment there are not available YouTube videos for this song
There are no more available videos of what you selected
Play live videos of this artist
Play live videos of similar artists not on my device
Do you want to continue reproducing the next song?
Move the slider to unlock the screen
An unknown error occurred while importing your library:
If you experience problems, we recommend you executing a library scan (menu->library scan).

In the first minutes jukefox will be a little bit slower and not all features are available due to the library import in the background. We recommend that you use this time to take a tour and learn how to use jukefox. Is that OK?
jukefox has finished importing new music.
Problem fetching covers. Restart import when sdcard is writable.
Sorry! No Music map can be displayed for your collection. Please tag your files correctly, connect to the internet, and run a library import (menu=>scan music library).
Successfully published a collage of todays listened music to facebook.
Couldn\'t publish the collage. Please try again later.
There are no covers available for building a collage.
There are too few covers available for building a collage.
Login failed. Please try again later.
The login to facebook was successful.
If you hit the send button, the following album-cover collage will be published on your facebook account.
Could not automatically send album-cover collage to facebook, as your login session has expired. Do you want to login and send the collage now?
My last 24h music listened with jukefox
My weekly music listened with jukefox
My daily music listened with jukefox
Could not play playlist for tag:
famous artists are not yet ready!
jukefox is currently importing your music library and might therefore react slowly to certain events.

Thanks for your using jukefox. If you have any problem or suggestions for jukefox, please contact us by mail prior to giving a bad rating. It is much easier to respond to a mail than to a comment in the Android Market.
Rate or comment in the Market
Send a mail to the developers

Thanks for using jukefox. We have rewritten major parts of jukefox to provide an even better experience. An important change is that the library import is now done in the background, and should recognize all music files (including those not present in the jukefox db). These changes make it necessary to import your music library again. If you experience any problems with the new version, please send us an e-mail (menu->feedback).

We have detected that you have several songs that have the same album name, but different artists. If you want to group these songs into one album, long click on the corresponding entry in the album list, and select \'group album\'. Alternatively you can edit the \'album artist\' tags of the corresponding songs using a tag editor.
This function is thought to group compilation albums (albums with several artists). The selected album name occurs only once in the album list. Thus, the album cannot be grouped.
Albums are grouped. Performing a library scan to make changes take effect.
Album is ungrouped. Performing a library scan to make changes take effect.
touch cover to see song list
Playlist is empty. Use the tabs to browse your collection.

Due to a legal issue, museek has been renamed to jukefox (see icon above). Thus, you have to start the player by selecting the jukefox icon in the application list. The museek icon will be removed with the next update. Have fun with jukefox!
You can activate shake skip in the settings, which allows you to skip a song by horizontally shaking the device.
Do you want jukefox to finish the library scan in the background (recommended)?
Drag here to select random songs
Some lines of the playlist file could not be imported.
